title: Champion not implemented yet
body: I can not buy anything, it says champion not implemented. Reloading wont work, restarting the computer wont work legacy client is gone, how do i fix this?

replies.body: Unlocking content through the Collections tab isn't available yet.  You'll want to buy your champs through the Store tab, which is located just to the left of your RP/IP balance.  Let me know if that clears things up!
hey, i am from my english is not the best. can u try to explain the solutiion in easy steps pls? Thank u!

AH Thank u guy! i tryed to understand and do what u wrote. it worked. 
i
